query: DELETE FROM room_types; INSERT INTO room_types (name, name_en, description, description_en, capacity, price, weekend_price, images, amenities, is_available, display_order) VALUES ('豪華雙人房', 'Deluxe Double', '寬敞舒適的雙人房', 'Spacious double room', 2, 1880, 2500, '[]', '[]', 1, 1), ('標準雙人房', 'Standard Double', '標準配置雙人房', 'Standard double room', 2, 1280, 1680, '[]', '[]', 1, 2), ('豪華四人房', 'Deluxe Quad', '寬敞的四人房', 'Spacious quad room', 4, 2880, 3800, '[]', '[]', 1, 3), ('標準四人房', 'Standard Quad', '標準配置四人房', 'Standard quad room', 4, 2280, 2980, '[]', '[]', 1, 4), ('家庭房', 'Family Room', '適合家庭的寬敞房間', 'Family room', 6, 3880, 4800, '[]', '[]', 1, 5), ('單人房', 'Single Room', '經濟型單人房', 'Single room', 1, 880, 1080, '[]', '[]', 1, 6), ('測試房型aaa', 'Test Room AAA', '測試房型', 'Test room', 2, 100, 150, '[]', '[]', 1, 7);
